languages.text: "Кунрад умудрился найти себе приспешницу в самом сердце Даргонуса... Регина! Кто бы мог подумать!"
"Kunrad has managed to find himself a henchwoman in the heart of Dargonus... Regina! Who would have thought it?"
languages.original_text: "Кунрад умудрился найти себе приспешницу в самом сердце Даргонуса... Регина! Кто бы мог подумать!"

traits.locale_text: "Kunrad has managed to find himself a henchwoman in the heart of Dargonus... Regina! Who would have thought it?"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Kunrad has managed to find himself a henchwoman in the heart of Dargonus... Regina! Who would have thought it?"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Kunrad has managed to find himself a henchwoman in the heart of Dargonus... Regina! Who would have thought it?"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Kunrad has managed to find himself a henchwoman in the heart of Dargonus... Regina! Who would have thought it?"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “昆拉德在达戈努斯的核心地带找到了一位帮凶……居然是蕾吉娜！谁能想到这种事情呢？”
languages.original_text: "Kunrad has managed to find himself a henchwoman in the heart of Dargonus... Regina! Who would have thought it?"

traits.locale_text: “昆拉德在达戈努斯的核心地带找到了一位帮凶……居然是蕾吉娜！谁能想到这种事情呢？”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Dire que Kunrad s'est trouvé une partisane au cœur même de Dargonus... et qu'il s'agit de nulle autre que Régina ! Qui aurait pu s'en douter ? »
languages.original_text: "Kunrad has managed to find himself a henchwoman in the heart of Dargonus... Regina! Who would have thought it?"

traits.locale_text: « Dire que Kunrad s'est trouvé une partisane au cœur même de Dargonus... et qu'il s'agit de nulle autre que Régina ! Qui aurait pu s'en douter ? »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Kunrad ha encontrado quien le haga el trabajo sucio en el corazón de Dargonus... ¡Regina! ¿Quién lo hubiera dicho?».
languages.original_text: "Kunrad has managed to find himself a henchwoman in the heart of Dargonus... Regina! Who would have thought it?"

traits.locale_text: «Kunrad ha encontrado quien le haga el trabajo sucio en el corazón de Dargonus... ¡Regina! ¿Quién lo hubiera dicho?».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「クンラッドはダルゴナスの中心で子分を見つけることに成功しました…レジーナ！誰が想像できたでしょうか？」
languages.original_text: "Kunrad has managed to find himself a henchwoman in the heart of Dargonus... Regina! Who would have thought it?"

traits.locale_text: 「クンラッドはダルゴナスの中心で子分を見つけることに成功しました…レジーナ！誰が想像できたでしょうか？」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Es ist Kunrad gelungen, im Herzen von Dargonus eine Henkerin zu finden ... Regina! Wer hätte das gedacht?"
languages.original_text: "Kunrad has managed to find himself a henchwoman in the heart of Dargonus... Regina! Who would have thought it?"

traits.locale_text: "Es ist Kunrad gelungen, im Herzen von Dargonus eine Henkerin zu finden ... Regina! Wer hätte das gedacht?"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.original_text: "Kunrad has managed to find himself a henchwoman in the heart of Dargonus... Regina! Who would have thought it?"

languages.text: "Kunrad, Dargonus'un ortasında kendine bir ortak bulmayı başarmış. Adı Regina! Kimin aklına gelirdi ki?"
languages.original_text: "Kunrad has managed to find himself a henchwoman in the heart of Dargonus... Regina! Who would have thought it?"

traits.locale_text: "Kunrad, Dargonus'un ortasında kendine bir ortak bulmayı başarmış. Adı Regina! Kimin aklına gelirdi ki?"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
